714230.name: Mighty Party: Kingsguy Pack
714230.description:
When all the secret services headquarters are destroyed and everyone is held by fear, the British Superagents have discovered an allied spy organization in Pangea World - "Kingsguy". This MIGHTY secret organization must defeat all the ruthless enemies to save the Universe, in other words to do a regular task of Mighty Party brave heroes...




List of incredibly powerful superagents of Pangea you will get:

• Prince x15 - Legendary Hero
• Chieftain Orc x15 - Legendary Hero
• Marquis de Sat x15 - Legendary Hero
• Gems x7500
• Gold x50000

Lead your MIGHTY PARTY to victory! -> Be no. 1!

For a new account: you'll get your rewards after the tutorial and 2 PVP fights.
If you’re not a new player please check that DLC is installed and restart the game.

NOTE: Included gems won't be counted for VIP level.
714230.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语, 法语, 德语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
